document.full_text: andy roddick extended his troubled start to the clay-court season with a 6-3, 6-3 loss to gilles simon of france in the opening round of the italian open on monday.
document.title: simon beats roddick in 1st round in rome
lines_and_colors: andy roddick extended his troubled start to the clay-court season with a 6-3, 6-3 loss to gilles simon of france in the opening round of the italian open on monday.
